page.title: 01The Survey Area
page.content: The area of our survey is mainly made up of housing estates,all of them a mixture of council and private,with only small areas of light industry. The area is divided into three in theEast and North East of{Cardiff.} { Llanedeyrn and Pentwyn}are in the North East.They are large housing estates that have been built since the late 1960's and early 1970's.A new area is now being built to the north of Pentwyn. The M4 and River Rumney separate these from {Llanrumney}another large housing estate,dating from the late 1950's,in the East of the city.Across the A48(Newport Road),are the other estates of{Rumney,St.Mellons and {Trowbridge.}Rumney and St.Mellons date from the 1950's or earlier.Trowbridge has grown since the 1960's,while today is growing still as the new St.Mellons
